author: lpmaho
title: MLabs - "The Universal Joint"
description: Cardano is growing quickly; however, countless stories go untold by the teams and individuals shaping this community.

author: ddlezu01
title: Theatre For Change
description: No one is currently using Theatre in Education to engage and inspire the young generation to understand Cardano Blockchain Technology.

author: hakua1993
title: A Film of Cardano Mission in Africa
description: How do we inspire the average person to align themselves with Cardano's mission while bringing clarity to what Cardano is doing in Africa.

author: tranthanhtung37
title: Cardano Annual Market Report
description: A lot of misinformation about Cardano exists in social media & little information is published in local public mediums (newspaper, magazine)

author: alfred.pham
title: MAKE CONTENT MORE FUN TO LEARN EASY
description: Guidelines need more media and sound for interesting and understanding easier

author: dposadas
title: ADA funded STEM themed indie film
description: There is a lot of FUD against crypto/Cardano ADA. The power of film has not been tapped to counter this.

author: habacef
title: Short educational series
description: Many people don't understand the difference between environmentally problematic (PoW) and PoS chains like Cardano. False facts are spread.

author: ericdberkeley
title: Cardano-centric YouTube-style site
description: The opportunity to learn more about Cardano and Ada is limited due to the extraordinary amount of noise, misinformation, and FUD on the web.

author: ericdberkeley
title: Cardano on PBS, Project Development
description: Differentiating Cardano from other blockchain efforts requires getting the word out to a broader audience in a well-respected forum like PBS

author: andrewgoodwall
title: Youth user generated content
description: Youth across the world are unaware of Cardano, the blockchain, and opportunities that exist, due to lack of credible video content.

author: otaviolima
title: Keeping Up with Cardano: 100 videos
description: People find it difficult to understand the potential of projects by reading whitepapers and websites, with unfriendly technical terms used.

author: donbrasil
title: Cadano UNE Brazil Branded Marketing
description: We believe that the biggest problem in Brazil is access to information, accessibility and low union of the existing community.

author: dimitri777
title: The Creators Story NFTs
description: There are no documentaries about how things get built in Cardano from start to finish. Content creators never tell their stories

author: carlhenryglobal
title: Monaco Streaming Film Festival 2022
description: Cardano needs a boost into mainstream awareness, more exposure to the public at large is required demonstrating the use-cases & benefits.

author: ditcameroon
title: Auditability through film and media
description:
--

There is no simple process for the community to follow funded proposals that offer complete comprehensive oversight and follow up.

author: sebpereira33
title: Decentralized Cinema Festival
description: NFTs are too associated with digital images or worse scams. The NFT needs a new use case that can showcase its true potential.

author: fractalfuzion
title: DUB popular ADA Video for the World
description: 10% of the worlds population speaks English. Would gather open source video content about Cardano then translate / DUB different languages

author: heinz.gassner
title: DLT360: Industry Onboarding Videos
description: Many decision makers in industry do not yet understand the potential of DLT/Blockchain, WEB3.0 and Metaverse, also due to bad communication

author: danielvancast
title: Animated Explainers for the world
description: The world is crowded with junk content, we need quality content to stand out, and spark the conversation.

author: petr.smelik
title: Blockchain Class by adatruth.com
description: Newcomers need education to understand the system + recognise scams. Lack of content on real world use cases explaining the vision + basics.

author: defidiscussions
title: Documentary: South America
description: Many recognize Cardano as a way of making money, ignoring Project Catalyst's goals to act as a tool to create positive change in the world.

author: bobpeace
title: Humble Records UBI Music Collective
description: No label is releasing music with a built in Universal Basic income; no label is fully embracing the potential of Cardano and Catalyst.

author: azlankonma
title: Permaculture & Blockchain: YouTube
description: Finding a connection between real-world sustainability and the emerging metaverse is a bridge that needs to be built for humanity to thrive.

author: jtrube
title: Japanese Cardano Master Class
description: Japanese interest in Cardano and blockchain technology is growing, but many still feel that it's still too new and complex to get involved.

author: cornl
title: Cardano Community Podcasts & YT
description: Cardano has a strong YouTube community but we need to push forward. How about enjoying Cardano-themed podcasts in our headphones?

author: checkpoint
title: Checkpoint Learning and Media
description: There is a lack of well established and established media projects with focus and use-case on DLT/Blockchain technology.

author: jaaf
title: Tunisian Video Creation for N-A
description: Cardano adoption is lacking in North-Africa. No reach is done on community education and engagement because of cultural barriers.

author: natnael
title: Cardano's Footprint in Ethiopia
description: Cardano's impact in Ethiopia is not well represented due to lack of proper narrative and showcasing what the flagship project is improving.

author: shirogat
title: Give Maasai Pastoralists DiD
description: Pastoralist Maasai are denied the right to an ID card for years due to punitive vetting procedures imposed on them

author: shlomocohen
title: CaricatorADA (CaricatureADA)
description: Cardano and its community is lacking creative and unique ways to promote Cardano, its philosophy and core values at scale.

author: glory
title: Cardano Innovator's Story
description: Today, The biggest problem with Cardano projects is a lack of information outlining stories of projects and technologies building on Cardano

author: petr.smelik
title: Wada documentary
description: Awareness of Wada projects is low despite the great work they do in Africa.

author: rsw33n3y
title: ADAO Education & Marketing Content
description: A lack of educational DAO content within the Cardano ecosystem.

author: keww
title: NFT Devs Bridge to Project Catalyst
description: There is a lack of connection between PC Community / Voters & NFT Project Creators / Developers
